home.subtitle: Human validation. No algorithms. Real impact.
home.explanationText: OnlyTips is a revolutionary platform where innovators submit their groundbreaking ideas for human validation. Unlike algorithmic systems, our expert reviewers provide real, thoughtful decisions on funding and selection. Your idea deserves a decision – submit it today and join the future of innovation.

paymentSuccess.title: PAYMENT CONFIRMED
paymentSuccess.subtitle: Your payment has been processed successfully and your idea has been registered
paymentSuccess.emailNotificationText: You will receive a confirmation email shortly. All future communications regarding your submission will be sent to your registered email address.
paymentSuccess.reviewProcessText: Our team will carefully review your submission. You will be notified via email if your idea is selected for investment or requires additional information.
paymentSuccess.nextStepsText: Keep an eye on your inbox. We typically respond within 5-7 business days. Selected ideas will receive detailed information about the investment process.
